attributes.action: Ban smoking in the House of Commons bar so YOU by the same rules we do!!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The smoking ban in bars in England has one eception, the bar in the house of commons. Why should it have one rule for us and another for you???????

You should have proposed a law where the owners and staff had to agree of public bars should have had gree smoking or nonsmoking. Instead you give the nation no choice while retaining that choice for MPs. Shame on you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
